definition: magnetic head (of a tape recorder etc)
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The mechanical device that moves something , usually read/write head.
sentences.chinese: 一种机械装置，用于移动诸如读写磁头之类的部件。

sentences.english: It controls spindle motor rotation and heads movements.
sentences.chinese: 它控制主轴马达转动和磁头运动。

sentences.english: When gate opening change, the relay connecting rod brings the magnetic head to move together.
sentences.chinese: 导叶开度变化时，接力器活塞杆带着磁头一起移动。

sentences.english: The operating principle of the magnetic head of the super-strong armour-piercing projectile is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了超强磁破甲弹磁头装置的工作原理。

sentences.english: The offtrack and crosstalk properties of perpendicular recording with a single pole head are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了垂直记录单极型磁头的偏道特性及串音特性。

sentences.english: Of course the tape path through the tape cartridge may also include the tape head.
sentences.chinese: 当然，穿过磁带盒的走带通道也可以包括磁头。

sentences.english: Lithography servo disk is a new servo locating technique for magnetic head.
sentences.chinese: 光刻伺服盘是一种新的磁头伺服定位技术。

sentences.english: The powerful Walkman is equipped with DBB circuitry with three selectable modes, and an amorphous head.
sentences.chinese: 这款强大的机型装备了3段DBB电路和非晶质磁头。

sentences.english: A catch or lever that locks the movement of one part of a mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 一种机械装置，用于移动诸如读写磁头之类的部件。

sentences.english: Golden Ball Bonding (GBB) process is an important process for Head Gimbal Assembly (HGA) production.
sentences.chinese: 金球焊接是生产磁头臂悬架组件的一道重要工序。

sentences.english: Finally, We discuss the interaction between head and medium with the soft magnetic underlayer .
sentences.chinese: 再者分了软磁衬底存在时，磁头与介质的相互作用。

sentences.english: In a magnetic disk unit, an arm on which magnetic heads are mounted.
sentences.chinese: 磁盘机中一种用于安装磁头的臂状部件。

sentences.english: Selects the request with the minimum seek time from the current head position.
sentences.chinese: 选择从当前磁头位置所需寻道时间最短的请求。

sentences.english: A charter fishing boat heads to sea from Newport, Oregon.
sentences.chinese: 来自俄勒冈州的纽波特，包机的渔船磁头出海。

sentences.english: This paper analysed permalloy audio heads and tapes for failure.
sentences.chinese: 对磨损失效的坡莫合金录音磁头和磁带进行了分析。

definition: CD or DVD Drive/abbr. for 光盤驅動器|光盘驱动器
CD or DVD drive/abbr. to 光驅|光驱
